text:
The code in XMLAbstractTranscoder does not seem to handle the case of XMLReader.
Worse, no exception is thrown and nothing happens at all.
creator: erik@bruchez.org

text:
I fixed this locally. I can send a patch if needed. I haven't checked if this is
already fixed in CVS,
Please do make the patch an attachement to this bug report.

This patch fixes the issue
